text: Thus kadhālika a supplement to the previous kadhālika naqussu ‘thus We relate’ Q. 2099 just as We have revealed what has been mentioned We have revealed it that is the Qur’ān as an Arabic Qur’ān and We have distributed We have repeated in it statements of threats so that they may fear associating others with God or it the Qur’ān may arouse in them a remembrance of the destruction of those communities before and may thus be admonished.
